criteria: All Firestore security rules for registration and user management are tested and passing; All custom claim logic is peer-reviewed for security vulnerabilities; No high-severity vulnerabilities found in dependency scans.
success_metrics: Zero cross-tenant data access vulnerabilities; Secure handling of all auth tokens and claims.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Mobile MVP Readiness
criteria: E2E tests for offline check-in and sync pass on both iOS and Android physical devices; All Supervisor approval workflows are functional; No P1 or P2 bugs related to core attendance tracking.
success_metrics: 100% reliability for offline data capture and sync; All core user flows are bug-free.

criteria: Google Sheets export is reliable and handles auth errors gracefully; Reporting data aggregation is accurate and performant under load testing; All UI meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards (RISK-004).
success_metrics: Zero data loss or duplication in Google Sheets export; Report load times under 5s p95; Full accessibility compliance.
